entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
